meanings.definition: To be mutually involved or connected with each other.
meanings.sent1: The students interinvolved in the group project to achieve success.
meanings.sent2: Family members often interinvolved in each other's lives to offer support.
meanings.sent3: The cats interinvolved in a playful game of chase around the house.
meanings.sent4: The roots of the trees interinvolved underground, forming a strong network.
meanings.sent5: The dancers interinvolved gracefully on stage, creating a beautiful performance.

meanings.definition: To have a close relationship or connection with others.
meanings.sent1: Neighbors interinvolved by helping each other during difficult times.
meanings.sent2: Close friends interinvolved by sharing their joys and sorrows.
meanings.sent3: The characters in the story interinvolved in a heartwarming friendship.
meanings.sent4: The melodies of the songs interinvolved seamlessly, creating a harmonious blend.
meanings.sent5: The team members interinvolved closely to achieve their common goal.
